description: Try our easy to follow Herby Chicken & Ricotta Cannelloni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Herby Chicken & Ricotta Cannelloni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place in a preheated oven, 180°C, Gas Mark 4, for 35-40 minutes or until cooked through and bubbling. Serve hot with a crisp green salad.
